title: CTERA Syslog
description: Ingest CTERA syslog data into Microsoft Sentinel

sampleQueries.description: Query to find all denied operations.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
   TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage),
   UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where Permission matches regex @"(?i).*denied.*"
| summarize Count = count() by Permission

sampleQueries.description: Query to find all delete operations.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
   TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage),
   UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where Permission == "op=delete"
| summarize Count = count() by Permission

sampleQueries.description: Query to summarize operations by user.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
   TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage),
   UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| summarize Count = count() by UserName, Permission

sampleQueries.description: Query to summarize operations by a portal tenant.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
   TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage),
   UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| summarize Count = count() by TenantName, Permission

sampleQueries.description: Query to find operations performed by a specific user.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
   TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage),
   UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where UserName == 'user=specific_user'
| summarize Count = count() by Permission

dataTypes.name: Syslog
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: Syslog | where Source == 'CTERA' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)

connectivityCriteria.value: Syslog | where Source == 'CTERA' | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated) | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(15m)

instructionSteps.title: Step 1: Connect CTERA Platform to Syslog
instructionSteps.description: Set up you CTERA portal syslog connection and Edge-Filer Syslog connector

instructionSteps.title: Porta Syslog connection
instructionSteps.description: Connect CTERA Portal to syslog server, see intructions https://kb.ctera.com/v1/docs/en/managing-log-settings?highlight=logg

instructionSteps.title: Edge Filer Audit logs
instructionSteps.description: Enable Audit logs on the desired Edge-filers

instructionSteps.title: Edge-Filer Syslog Service
instructionSteps.description: Enable Edge-Filer Syslog service, see instructions https://kb.ctera.com/v1/docs/en/setting-up-the-edge-filer-syslog-service-2?highlight=Edge%20Filer%20Syslog

instructionSteps.title: Step 2: Install Azure Monitor Agent (AMA) on Syslog Server
instructionSteps.description: Install the Azure Monitor Agent (AMA) on your syslog server to enable data collection.

instructionSteps.title: Log in to Azure Portal
instructionSteps.description: Use your Azure credentials to log in to the Azure Portal.

instructionSteps.title: Navigate to Azure Arc
instructionSteps.description: In the Azure Portal, go to 'Azure Arc' and select your connected syslog server.

instructionSteps.title: Select Extensions
instructionSteps.description: In the Azure Arc settings for your syslog server, navigate to the 'Extensions' section.

instructionSteps.title: Add Extension
instructionSteps.description: Click on 'Add' and select 'Azure Monitor Agent' from the list of available extensions.

instructionSteps.title: Install AMA
instructionSteps.description: Follow the prompts to install the Azure Monitor Agent on your syslog server. For detailed instructions, refer to the official documentation: [Install Azure Monitor Agent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/agents/azure-monitor-agent-manage?tabs=azure-portal)
